name: NEVPNConnection
desc: An object to start and stop a Personal VPN connection and get its status.

items.name: func startVPNTunnel()
items.desc: Start the process of connecting the VPN.

items.name: func startVPNTunnel(options: [String : NSObject]?)
items.desc: Start the process of connecting the VPN.

items.name: func stopVPNTunnel()
items.desc: Start the process of disconnecting the VPN.

items.name: var status: NEVPNStatus
items.desc: The current status of the VPN connection.

items.name: var connectedDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time when the connection status changed to NEVPNStatusConnected.

items.name: static let NEVPNStatusDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the status of the VPN connection changes.
